spec.help:
The wrap text setting.
If `true`, the text wraps and displays on multiple lines.
Otherwise, the text is truncated.
Only applies to `Text`, not `Top Label` and `BottomLabel`.
spec.name: wrapText
spec.label: Wrap Text

spec.help:
The text that appears above Text.
Always truncates.
spec.name: topLabel
spec.label: Top Label

spec.help:
The text that appears below Text.
Always truncates.
spec.name: bottomLabel
spec.label: Bottom Label

nested.name: headers
nested.label: Headers

nested.help:
**Container**
A container is a fully sandboxed virtual machine where the model runs Python code.

**Expiration Time**
Containers expire if unused for 20 minutes. The expiration timer is reset after any operation on the container.
nested.name: container_type
nested.label: Container type

mappable.help: Map the container ID. For example: `cntr_6878d51b5ffc8191b7c32c11c747cf4e`.
